name: Arcanine
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: A Pokémon that is described in Chinese legends. It is said to race at an unbelievable speed.

abilities.name: Burning Road
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokémon this turn, you may move any number of {R} Energy attached to your Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scorching Breath
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t attack during your next turn.
